main event: A farmer and his two sons observed a sky-blue, inverted pie plate-shaped object flying at 75 feet above the ground in the Snake River Canyon near Twin Falls, Idaho.
interesting points: The object was described as being 20 feet wide and 10 feet thick., The sighting occurred on August 13, 1947, at approximately 1300 MST., The children noted that the object produced a swooshing sound as it passed., Trees in the area spun around as if affected by a vacuum, which the farmer described., Three separate observers reported different objects in the area within two hours.
witness description: A farmer and his two sons, aged 8 and 10, observed the flying object.
